original_text: “Then he said to his servants, ‘The wedding banquet is ready, but those I invited did not deserve to come.
korean_text: 이에 종들에게 이르되 혼인 잔치는 준비되었으나 청한 사람들은 합당하지 아니하니

sentences.original_text: Then he said to his servants
but those I invited did not deserve to come
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 내가 초대한 자들은 합당하지 않았다
